name: BuildFive.com
overview:
Web based marketing software to help Real Estate Professionals manage and fulfill their Direct Mail while saving them Time and Money.

Buildfive.com is a technology company started in 2007 by the Carter family. The Carters are real estate investors and have spent years doing their own direct mail in their home office or the kitchen counter at night and on weekends. After years of searching for better solutions and looking for companies that can do small batches of letters and post cards cost effectively, they started developing a web based application to plan, organize, and deliver their own direct mail. Partnering with several printers, and mail fulfillment houses, Buildfive.com can deliver high quality printing and postage at competitive prices for any size printing needs, from an easy to use web based application.

The power and advantage of BuildFive lies in our exclusive “Campaign Manager”. At BuildFive, subscribers are able to store and manage their mailing assets, obtain highly targeted mailing lists, and manage a multitude of mailing campaigns all on an easy-to-view dashboard. WeÂ´ve reduced the hours of doing a 500 pce mailing campaign down to a few simple steps and clicks on our site. Need to track multiple mailing campaigns, and/or schedule, weeks or months in advance? No problem, at BuildFive you can set up very simple mailers to very complex campaigns and its all calendar driven. You can literally set up mailing campaigns months in advance, and then adjust your budget, re-fresh mailing lists and/or the content of mailers as needed, with little effort.
